properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 11:02PM EST until February 9 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Raleigh NC
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North
Carolina...

Rocky River Near Norwood affecting Anson and Stanly Counties
Tar River At Louisburg affecting Franklin County
Tar River At Tarboro affecting Edgecombe County
Tar River At Rocky Mount affecting Edgecombe County

The Flood Warning continues for the Tar River At Louisburg.
* At 10:47 PM Friday the stage was 21.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* The river will continue rising to near 21.2 feet by
tomorrow morning. The river will fall below flood stage tomorrow evening.
* At 23.0 feet, Major flood stage. Homes and businesses along
Johnson Street flood.
* At 22.0 feet, Moderate flood stage. Flooding begins in
Pruitt and Shannon Villages on the east side of town.
* At 20.0 feet, Minor flood stage. Banks overflow at Main
Street. River Bend Park is flooded and storm drains are inundated
along the river.
properties.instruction:
Safety message. If you encounter deep water while driving, do not
attempt to drive through. Turn around, dont drown.
